entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnableRequestDelegateGenerator fails when MapX is on its own line #50164
    8.0-rc2
  • Baggage not extracted without trace id from the request #50158
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #50157
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #50156
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #50155
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #50154
  • Avoid computing `FormFeature` when calling `HttpRequest.HasFormContentType` #50153
  • Blazor WASM: consider adding support for one-file / single-file / atomic deployments #50148
  • Better deal with cycles in SSR Blazor component parameters #50147
    8.0-rc2
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-rc.1.23415.7] Fail to load local css,js with Cofoundry template. #50141
  • Blazor - Issue with SectionContent components when using @attribute [RenderModeServer(prerender:false)] #50139
  • Failed to scaffold Identity in a default Blazor Web App in .net 8 #50136
  • Poor gRPC performance on test #50135
  • WebApiAot ProjectTemplate add swagger document #50134
  • NSwag.AspNetCore instead of Swashbuckle.AspNetCore #50133
    Discussions
  • Reconsider enabling HTTP/3 by default in .NET 8 #50131
    8.0-rc1

Closed

  • Modify EventCounter usage to support the new metric APIs as well #33387
    8.0-rc1
  • Review types passed to metrics tags #48530
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Introduce an IServiceCollection extension method for enabling HTTPS configuration #49967
    8.0-rc1
  • No service for type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.IHttpsConfigurationService' after upgrading to .NET 8 preview #48956
    8.0-rc1
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #49640
  • Perf regression: caching #50109
  • [Blazor] API for enhanced page refresh #50014
    8.0-rc1
  • Ability to programmatically perform an "enhanced page refresh" #49414
    8.0-rc1
  • .Net 8 Blazor web app can be like .Net 7 Wasm Core Host? #50137
  • Dotnet 8 preview 7 - Consistent reactivation of "OnInitializedAsync" and "Dispose" on page change with Blazor #50138
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter #50108
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter #50107
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter, plainTextWithFilter #50106
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction, plainTextWithFilter #50105
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction, plainTextEmptyFilter #50104
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter #50103
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction, plainTextSansFilter #50102
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #50087
  • Perf improvement: json, mvc #50077
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #50061
  • Perf regression: Endpoint routing #50008
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #49985
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #49934
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, plaintext, single_query #49933
  • Perf improvement: json #49908
  • Perf improvement: caching, plainTextWithFilter, plainTextWithFilter #49133
  • Perf improvement: caching, plaintext, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #49122
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts #48704
  • System.NullReferenceException at Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.DefaultHttpRequest.get_Query \ get_HasFormContentType #49991
  • Can't go to the View in Areas #50115
  • Can't run Blazor wasm startproject #49661
  • Add a method to efficiently bulk create users in ASP.NET Identity. #49701
  • I'm not sure what you mean by a real world example, but you can look at how the authenticator token provider as an example: https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/blob/main/src/Identity/Extensions.Core/src/AuthenticatorTokenProvider.cs #49883

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Close the circuit when all Blazor Server components are disposed #50170
    area-blazor
  • SignInManager.AuthenticationScheme rename #50169
    area-identity
  • Call AddMetrics inside AddRouting #50168
    area-runtime, area-routing
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50167
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Resolve FormOptionsMetadata to FormOptions when reading form #50166
    feature-http-abstractions, area-middleware
  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #50163
    area-runtime, area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • Make it clear in the bot comment that repros must be GitHub repos and not ZIPs #50149
    area-infrastructure, needs-area-label
  • Persist Prerendered State #50146
    area-blazor
  • Support Keyed Services in MVC #50145
    area-mvc

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #50150
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 8.0-rc2
  • Support resolving keyed services from DI in RDF and RDG #50095
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-rdg, area-minimal, feature-rdf, 8.0-rc1
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [Blazor] Add APIs for "enhanced refresh" #50124
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Add APIs for "enhanced refresh" #50068
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Support hot reload for Blazor component endpoints #50031
    area-blazor
  • Stateful Reconnect API changes #50092
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr
  • [SignalR] Pass new App to Transport Pipe to App layer #49650
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr
  • [SignalR][TS client] Stateful reconnect #49940
    area-signalr, feature-client-javascript
  • Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50128
    area-runtime
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2246307 #49575
    area-mvc
  • [DRAFT] Consider symlinks when watching certificate file paths #50074
    area-runtime
  • Styling Update for Header and Footer Elements #50130
    community-contribution, feature-templates
